products.name: Daffodil Garden Starter Kit

products.name: Hope Blooms T-Shirt
products.description: 100% organic cotton t-shirt featuring our signature daffodil design. Available in sizes S-XXL.

products.description: Beautiful 16x20 gallery-wrapped canvas featuring original daffodil artwork by local artists.

products.name: Foundation Coffee Mug

products.name: Annual Membership

products.name: Daffodil Note Cards Set
products.description: Set of 12 handcrafted note cards with envelopes, featuring different daffodil varieties.

products.name: Garden Tool Set
products.description: Professional-grade 3-piece garden tool set with ergonomic handles and carrying case.

products.name: Foundation Tote Bag

products.name: Children's Gardening Kit
